mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.USERNAME, A.PASSWORD, A.NICKNAME, A.SALT, A.USERSTATUS, B.DEPID, C.DEPNAME, B.ORGID FROM JBOS_USER A LEFT JOIN JBOS_EMP B ON A.USERNAME=B.BADGE LEFT JOIN JBOS_DEP C ON B.DEPID=C.ID WHERE A.USERNAME=#{username}
SELECT C.ROLECODE FROM JBOS_USER A INNER JOIN JBOS_USER_ROLE B ON A.ID=B.USERID INNER JOIN JBOS_ROLE C ON B.ROLEID=C.ID WHERE A.USERNAME=#{username}
